title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Lawsuit Involving Fake News Story (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Lawsuit Involving Fake News Story (Audio)
description:
Erik Larson, Bloomberg News legal reporter, joined June Grasso to discuss a new lawsuit accusing President Trump of collaborating with Fox News to concoct a story that a DNC staffer was killed for leaking Hillary Clinton's emails to Wikileaks.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
